Label.text: 'Collected Data' is your data that is transferred off your phone or device to another location that allows the company providing the app, or third-parties, to access or utilize it.
These uses can be to provide a service, like Dikota's find nearby users feature, to deliver targed ads or sold to third parties.
Collected data can be linked to your digital identity as 'Identifying Data' or anonymized as 'Non-Identifying'.
Tracking refers to the ability to track you and your data across apps that are owned by other companies using device-based or other digital identifiers.
